explains: v. 为……举行就职典礼；为……举行落成仪式；开创，开展

sentences.en: Afghanistan is due to inaugurate a parliament.
sentences.cn: 阿富汗将举行新议会典礼。

sentences.en: Q: the 8th China-ASEAN Expo will inaugurate tomorrow. Please brief us on the attendance of ASEAN leaders.
sentences.cn: 问：第八届中国-东盟博览会将于明天开幕，请介绍东盟国家政要出席情况。

sentences.en: In 1971, invited to inaugurate the International Year for Action to Combat Racism, levi-strauss gave a lecture entitled Race and Culture.
sentences.cn: 1971年，列维·斯特劳斯应邀出席反种族主义国际行动年启动仪式，并发表了题为《种族与文化》的演讲。
